summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3993 for the improvement of West 61st Street from 32nd Avenue Northwest to a point approximately 425 feet west of 32nd Avenue Northwest; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48533, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
